file_content.text: You're placing the bounty, here. Details are up to you. All I'm saying is you better be sure.
Look, if it's a matter of credits, we can negotiate a new price.
But I've been cheated out of everything I own. She deserves to die.
Disintegration's extra. Not to mention permanent. Seems like you're overdoing it.
You may be right. After all, she is my wife.
